title: The proposal shall be submitted by the Owner, containing the demand assessment for infrastructure su
clause_text: The proposal shall be submitted by the Owner, containing the demand assessment for infrastructure such as roads, water supply, sewerage and storm water drains along with clearly earmarking the area for Public
